RateLawGroup.h File Reference

Defines the abstract class RateLawGroup which is used by the RateManager class to combine rate laws which are evaluated at the same temperature in order to compute the rate coefficient for these reactions efficiently. More...

 Mutation::Kinetics
 

Detailed Description

Defines the abstract class RateLawGroup which is used by the RateManager class to combine rate laws which are evaluated at the same temperature in order to compute the rate coefficient for these reactions efficiently.

See also
class RateLawGroup
class RateLawGroup1T
class RateLawGroupCollection
